bibl.title: The Painted Tomb from Wardian and the Decoration of the Alexandrian Tombs.
bibl.note: The Painted Tomb from Wardian, Alexandria: description (saqiya and oxen, herm, shepherd and flock, soul bird, reclining male), interpretation (iconography differs from Early Christian Tombs), date (II c. B.C.), Greek tradition and Egyptianizing elements.
bibl.seg: Venit Marjorie Susan, The Painted Tomb from Wardian and the Decoration of the Alexandrian Tombs.

The Painted Tomb from Wardian, Alexandria: description (saqiya and oxen, herm, shepherd and flock, soul bird, reclining male), interpretation (iconography differs from Early Christian Tombs), date (II c. B.C.), Greek tradition and Egyptianizing elements.
